title: How to Find if Someone is Following You on Twitter

steps.title: Go to X and log in to your account.
steps.content: Go to X and log in to your account . Open www.twitter.com in your browser and sign in with your username and password.

steps.title: Go to the profile of the person
steps.content: Go to the profile of the person . Move to the search bar and search for their username and select the account from the results.

steps.title: Move to his/her bio section.
steps.content: Move to his/her bio section. If someone is following your account, you can see the Follows you text near their @username . That's it!
